title: St Bride to host PHS: Hot Metal to Hot Keys
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080405115054/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 1.Feb.2008 8.37am 

Hot Metal to Hot Keys  
Printing Historical Society Conference 2008  
22-23 April 2008  
St Bride Library, London

’Hot Metal to Hot Keys: 50 years of turmoil 1950-1999’ focuses on recent changes in the printing industry and features speakers with direct experience at the cutting edge. There will be a number of short films produced by the industry during the period. Gravure, flexography, printing on demand, phototypesetting, dry transfer, strike-on composition and other long- or short-lived processes and machines, and their impact, will all be explored.

Registration is now open for the 2008 Printing Historical Society conference.

For programme details, visit the PHS website:  
 [http://www.printinghistoricalsociety.org.uk/forthcoming\_events/index.htm...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080405115054/http:/www.printinghistoricalsociety.org.uk/forthcoming_events/index.html#65 "http://www.printinghistoricalsociety.org.uk/forthcoming\_events/index.html#65")

To register, go to the St Bride website:  
 [http://stbride.org/events\_education/events/fromhotmetaltohotkeys](http://web.archive.org/web/20080405115054/http:/stbride.org/events_education/events/fromhotmetaltohotkeys "http://stbride.org/events\_education/events/fromhotmetaltohotkeys")

Early registration rates apply until 1 March 2008.
author: Miss Tiffany
